name: enp-patrol
description: ENP Patrol - On-duty status from Google Calendar and live patrol location from Traccar

scripts.build:react: cd static && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && rm -rf public/static public/css public/js public/index.html public/favicon.ico public/logo*.png public/manifest.json && mkdir -p public && cp static/build/index.html public/ && cp -r static/build/static/* public/ && cp static/build/favicon.ico static/build/manifest.json static/build/logo*.png public/ 2>/dev/null || true && sed -i.bak 's|src="/static/|src="/|g' public/index.html && sed -i.bak 's|href="/static/|href="/|g' public/index.html && rm -f public/index.html.bak
